Posted By: TexasDice (3/12/2013 8:19:56 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
What's not to like about this card?  
It's a bear (2/2 for 2 mana) which is not great, but definitely not bad.  
It's common.  
It gives you an option for taking care of enchantments.  
If you don't need to kill an enchantment right now, you can still get a few punches in before a scary enchantment comes along.  
Art by Terese Nielsen.  
If magic players want more, then that proves how greedy we have all got with our cards.
posts.html:
